Text: WTF is format .mpc ?! mp3 is almost ISO format, pls use it!
mp3 is hardly an ISO standard, not with all the patent claims on it. Musepack is on the other hand, free and open source, so quit your whining. :-)
i wrote almost - that was means 95% user use it :-)

always, ALWAYS! rip in mp3 @ 320kbps
if not ripping in WAV

and NEVER EVER use VBR
lol
